text: Radu Vasile (10 October 1942 â€“ 3 July 2013) was a Romanian historian, poet and politician. He was the 57th Prime Minister of Romania, serving from 17 April 1998 to 13 December 1999. He was also a Senator from the Democratic Party (PD) from 2000 to 2004. Aside from politics, Vasile used to write poetry under the pen name Radu Mischiu. He died from colorectal cancer on 3 July 2013 in Bucharest. ==References== Category:Romanian poets Category:Prime Ministers of Romania Category:Romanian historians Category:1942 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Radu Vasile
